title: Walker

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player is visited by two or more people, one visitor at random will attack another visitor at random. This will be seen by Lookouts, Trackers, and whoever else should see it.
- Protective roles guarding the attacked visitor will kill the attacker.
- You will never be killed by the attacking visitor.
- You may walk three times.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: "A sudden rage takes over your train of thought. You attack the first person in sight!"

desc:
Post 520
*Don't let me catch you on these streets, boy.*
